name: Breakout by Benjamin
description:
This game was a project that was made during my second trimester of study at SAE Sydney. In this project we were required to make a basic version of 'Breakout' totally in C++ in 12 weeks. We learned how to initialize the project, proper C++ coding formatting as well as how to use other C++ libraries. In this case my project uses ImGui, SFML and irrKlang.

Thank you so much for reading and for (hopefully) playing my game. I really, really enjoyed making this project and I hope that you can find some enjoyment in a project that I spent around 12 weeks of my life on! Thank you again and I hope you have fun!

- Benjamin Gulliver aka fatherbeno
